intro:
A long time ago, in a department far,
far away....
text:
It is a period of basic research. Experimental scientists, working in their hidden laboratory, have won their first victory against a new murine strain: T286A.

By tedious manual analysis of experimental data, they have created A PLOT suggesting the strain suffers from a strong disturbance of social behaviour.

However, despite the assistance of two Data Scientists, their efforts of reproducing THE PLOT remain insignificant (p > 0.05)....
title: THE IRREPRODUCIBILITY STRIKES BACK
